text: William Joseph Kidney (9 December 1907 - 4 February 1975) was an Irish National Hunt racing jockey, during the 1930s and 1940s. He rode in the Grand National 4 times, his best result being 2nd place on Jack Finlay in 1946. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Irish jockeys
title: William Kidney
